name: Far Out (Beta)
description:
(Beta 0.5)

Far Out is a virtual reality experience set in an RPG world, delve into the lands of Far Out and experience this prototype game that has you explore an open world that you can completely alter! Fight enemies with sword combat and level trees and rocks with tools.

Feedback form -https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1N5gdtHkUGm8dNJfsMXHeSOxFYeTroCnNoyU6CM43beo/edi...
